Transcript: Lucy: Abe, you -- you do remember me, don't you?

Abe: I remember someone who looks just like you whacking me over the head

Lucy: Oh, you know, I said I'm sorry about that. I -- I certainly didn't mean 
to hurt you. I'm not a violent person, believe me. I'm actually a nice person.
Abe: Well, nice or not, I'm not supposed to have any visitors.

Lucy: I know. I'm not an ordinary visitor, though. I happen to be on the 
hospital board here.
Abe: That give you permission to torture the patients?

Lucy: I'm not here to bother you. Listen, I wouldn't be here if I didn't have 
a very good reason. I really think we need to talk about what happened to you in 
those woods.
Abe: Oh, no, we don't.

Lucy: Yeah, we do. Listen, what was it? Was it an animal attack? Did 
something attack you? Is that what happened? Can you just tell me what you

Abe: Why? Why should I?

Lucy: Because I need your help. Because I have this friend, Abe. His name is

Caleb: Patience, Caleb, patience. This is all new to you, isn't it, Olivia? 
You're trying to deny your feelings. The more you try, the more you know I'm 
always going to be there, no matter how hard you try to shut me out.
Jack: Oh, Livvie, I missed you so much.
Livvie: And I missed you, too.
Jack: I need you. I cannot stop thinking about you when I'm not with you.
Livvie: Shh. I'm just so happy you're here now.
Jack: You smell so good. And you feel so right like this.

Livvie: I know. It's the only thing that does feel right. Everything else,

Jack: I know. All right, mine, too.

Livvie: But you're here now and none of that matters. I just want you to make

Jack: Believe me, I want to be that person for you. I want to be that place

Livvie: And you always will be. Alison and Jamal told me to stay away, that

anything to me, and whatever they think, they're just -- they're overreacting. I 
mean, they are. Aren't they, Jack? Jack? What is it? Look, I need to know the

Livvie: Jack, answer me, please.
Jack: Livvie, what exactly did Jamal and Alison say about me?

Livvie: They said you took on Zach's gang in the alley with your bare hands 
and nearly killed them all. Is that true?
Jack: I don't know.
Livvie: So, then, it didn't happen.
Jack: No, no. Look, it's possible.
Livvie: Jack, I don't understand.

Jack: Livvie, neither do I. All right, something has changed. Something's

Livvie: All I can see is that you're angrier and you can't wait to fight. The

Jack: But it was. And you know what? I might be putting you in danger.
Livvie: No.
Jack: Yes. You might not be safe with me right now.

Livvie: I can see deep down inside you, deep into your soul, and I know you

Jack: But, Livvie --
Livvie: Never, no matter how lost or confused you are.

Jack: Yeah. You are the only pure thing in my life right now. Everything else

Livvie: And you never will.

Jack: Livvie, I need to know that I can hold on to this, that our love is

Livvie: Of course it is. And of course you can because I am not going to

Jack: I can't live without you.
Gabriela: You forgot to sign your revised schedule again.
Joe: Sorry.

Joe: Well, that's all she'll tell me.
Karen: Maybe I should talk to her.

Joe: Thanks, Karen.
Karen: What are old friends for?
Kevin: Hello, Karen.
Karen: Kevin. Heard about a great new discovery called sleep?

Karen: Yeah. She was here with Jack Ramsey a little while ago.
Kevin: Jack?

Lucy: You need to tell me what happened to you on that fishing trip with

Abe: I wasn't feeling well. Woke up on the ground. I heard Victor calling.

Lucy: Oh! Help!

Abe: Ah!
Kevin: Hold him!

Kevin: God, Lucy, are you all right?
Lucy: Are you ok? I'm ok. Are you ok?
Kevin: I'm fine, I'm fine. Let's just get out of here.
Lucy: Oh, Doc. Oh, for a minute there, I really thought I was a goner.

Lucy: I was trying to get answers, Doc. I need answers.
Kevin: Trying to find out what happened to Abe in the woods, right?

Kevin: Are you listening to me?

Lucy: Are you listening to me? Doc, please. There has to be a connection
